department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.en: “With an emphasis on human biology, the goal of this course is to build up the background knowledge and basic principles of biology for students. It covers cell biology, molecular biology and human physiology. Applications of this knowledge in biotechnology and genetic technologies are explored. Learners gain an understanding of the theoretical and the scientific skills essential for further scientific developments.“
goal.ch: 本課程的目的是幫助學生建構基礎且廣泛的生物學概念。課程內容將包含於細胞生物學、分子生物學與人體生理學。為增加學生學習興趣，本課程也將專題介紹生物學與工程領域的結合，以實際例子介紹基礎生物學的在生活上的應用與發展。

content.en:
“Week01 Ch1 - Introduction : Biology Today
Week02 Ch2 - Essential Chemistry for Biology
Week03 Ch3 - The molecules of Life
Week04 Ch 4 ＆5 -The cell
Week05 Ch 6 ＆ 7- Cell energy: cellular respiration and photosynthesis
Week06 Ch8 -Cellular reproduction
Week07 Ch 10 - The structure and function of DNA
Week08 Ch 11 - How Genes are controlled
Week09 Midterm exam
Week10 Ch21- Animal Structure and Function
Week11 Ch22-Nutrition and Digestion
Week12 Ch23 Circulation and Respiration
Week13 Ch25 hormone
Week14 Ch26 - Reproduction and Development
Week15 Ch27 I - The senses : Visual and auditory system
Week16 Ch27 II- The senses : sensory and motor system
Week17 field trip
Week18 Final Exam“

textbook.en: “Campbell Essential Biology with Physiology, third edition“
textbook.ch: “Campbell Essential Biology with Physiology, third edition“

method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

grading.en: “Mid exam : 30％ Final exam : 30 ％ Project : 20 ％ Homework and attendance : 20％“
grading.ch: “Mid exam : 30％ Final exam : 30 ％ Project : 20 ％ Homework and attendance : 20％“

domain.en: 專業語文表達領域 、 計算分析領域 、 生醫生化技術領域 、 醫學電子資訊與影像處理 、 基礎醫學 、 轉譯醫學 、 認知神經科理論 、 計算神經科學
domain.ch: 專業語文表達領域 、 計算分析領域 、 生醫生化技術領域 、 醫學電子資訊與影像處理 、 基礎醫學 、 轉譯醫學 、 認知神經科理論 、 計算神經科學

en.competency: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning

ch.competency: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試

ch.competency: 培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試
